item.description:
Lightroom 101 Workshop

Lightroom is the essential software tool for any serious photographer. Come and learn the fundamentals of this incredibly powerful tool that many professionals have come to rely on with certified Lightroom instructor Kathy Tarantola.

Kathy will take you through the entire Develop workflow, reviewing tools as she goes. Topics emphasized will be based on student needs. You will have time to practice with your own images, ask questions, and get feedback on your work.

The class will also cover the basics of the Slideshow, Print and Web modules, all of which take your workflow to a professional conclusion.
When: Saturday, February 23, 11AM - 5PM
Location: Digital Silver Imaging, 9 Brighton Avenue, Belmont, MA
Cost: $149 for more info and to register follow this link

Â 

I'm just passing this along to meet up folks in case anyone might be interested. If you are please sign up with Digital Silver Imaging!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
